author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve installation tips…I make my wood blocking plumb. And I set it to the correct depth based on the tile and tile backer board. If this is done right, the trim will seal against the tile. That prevents water leaks inside the shower wall 👍🏽🔥#showervalve #plumbing #bathroomremodel #homeremodeling
title: Shower Valve Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
